name: Tempering Workshop: A Fresh Start!
desc: A large advertisement from the Tempering Workshop. Where it's placed is as interesting as those big, bombastic words written on it.

volumes.title: Tempering Workshop: A Fresh Start!
volumes.localDesc:
Recycle old and broken parts
Refurbish worn parts
New high-quality parts readily available
Repaying the favor for your ten years of continued support
Tempering Workshop: A Fresh Start!

Our store, formerly known as "Worn Relics Appraisal and Recycling," specializes in various ancient relic appraisal, repair, and recycling
The store is small, but it has been with Rivet Town through its ups and downs
It has also become a reputable store in Rivet Town
Now it is time to give back to the enthusiastic and supportive community
From today, our shop will be renamed "Tempering Workshop"
With added services on top the store's original specialties:
Recycling and refurbishing worn parts
Selling new high-quality parts of various kinds
And many more new services!

Grand Opening on March 28!
Worn parts will be replaced at low prices!
Buy 1 get 1 free on premium parts!
A store of repute, quality guaranteed!
Dear friends, hurry on down!
